channel.title: generics on Ramblings of a cloud engineer
channel.description: Recent content in generics on Ramblings of a cloud engineer

item.title: Generic dig for map key using typed parameters
item.description: Generic dig for map key using typed parameters Hello! I was fiddling with a way of getting out values from a map that is of format map[string]any. But I wanted my type safety as well. This was coming from digging out keys from a Metadata field. The metadata was in a JSON format. This is what I came up with: / FetchValueFromMetadata fetches a key from a metadata if it exists.
